00022 /**
00023  * @file   GcBg.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Sep 25 16:27:31 PDT 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Class for doing an background adjustment on all probes based
00028  * on the median intensity of probes with similar GC content.
00029  */
00030 
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/GcBg.h"

00047 using namespace std;
00048 using namespace affx;
00049 
00050 void GcBg::learnParameters(const std::vector<float> &data, int binCount, std::vector<vector<float> > &chipBins,
00051                            std::vector<int> &probes, std::vector<char> &probeGcVec, bool warnings) {
00052   unsigned int probeIx = 0, binIx = 0;
00053   vector<vector<float> > gcBins(binCount);
00054   if(probeGcVec.empty()) {
00055     Err::errAbort("GcBg::learnParameters() - Must have some gc control probes set to calculate background.");
00056   }
00057   // Fill in the bins with raw data processed by chip streams.
00058   for(probeIx = 0; probeIx < probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00059     float intensity = 0;
00060     unsigned int bin = 0;
00061     int probeIndex = probes[probeIx];
00062     if(probeGcVec[probeIndex] == (char)NULLPROBEGC)
00063       Err::errAbort("GcBg - Need probe index: " + ToStr(probeIndex) + " GC count for background, but wasn't loaded.");
00064     bin = probeGcVec[probeIndex];
00065     if(bin >= binCount || bin < 0) {
00066       Err::errAbort("Probe: " + ToStr(probeIndex) + " has gc content of: " + ToStr(probeGcVec[probeIndex]) + 
00067                     " expecting between 0 and " + ToStr(binCount));
00068     }
00069     intensity = data[probeIndex];
00070     gcBins[bin].push_back(intensity);
00071   }
00072   vector<float> binMeds(binCount, 0);
00073   // Estimate the medians for each bin.
00074   for(binIx = 0; binIx < gcBins.size(); binIx++) {
00075     // Unlike GcAdjust, we will default to 0 rather than error. Otherwise
00076     // one would have to have the GC count for all probes on the array
00077     float med =  0;
00078     if(gcBins[binIx].empty()) {
00079       if(warnings)
00080         Verbose::out(2, "Warning: GC Bin " + ToStr(binIx) + " has no data.");
00081     }
00082     else
00083       med = median_in_place(gcBins[binIx].begin(), gcBins[binIx].end());
00084     binMeds[binIx] = med;
00085   }
00086   chipBins.push_back(binMeds);
00087 }
00088 
00089 float GcBg::transform(int probeIx, int chipIx, float intensity, int gcBin) {
00090   float result = 0;
00091   if(gcBin == (char)NULLPROBEGC) {
00092     Verbose::out(4,"Unable to figure out GC count for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIx + 1) + ". Using 0 for GC correction.");
00093   } 
00094   else {
00095     if(gcBin < 0 || gcBin >= m_MaxGc) {
00096       Err::errAbort("GC count out of accepted range for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIx + 1) +
00097                     " Cel file: " + m_TransformedIMart->getCelFileNames()[chipIx]);
00098     }
00099     // Return the pre calculated median for GC count.
00100     result = m_Bins[chipIx][gcBin];
00101   }
00102   if(m_Attenuate) {
00103     result = QuantMethod::attenuateIntensity(intensity, result, m_L, m_H);
00104   }
00105   else { 
00106     result = intensity - result;
00107   }
00108   return result;
00109 }
00110 
00111 float GcBg::transform(int probeIx, int chipIx, float intensity) {
00112   // Look up probe gc count.
00113   char gc = m_BgProbeGc[probeIx];
00114   float result = transform(probeIx, chipIx, intensity, gc);
00115   return result;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void GcBg::transform(int chipIx, std::vector<float>& intensity) {
00119   for (uint32_t probeIx = 0; probeIx < intensity.size(); probeIx++) {
00120     intensity[probeIx] = transform(probeIx, chipIx, intensity[probeIx]);
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 void GcBg::newChip(std::vector<float> &data) {
00125    learnParameters(data, m_MaxGc, m_Bins, m_BgProbes, m_BgProbeGc, m_ChipCount == 0);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void GcBg::newDataSet(IntensityMart* iMart) {
00129   int dataSetCount = iMart->getCelDataSetCount();
00130   m_TransformedIMart = iMart;
00131   // if there aren't any chipstream nodes after this, then don't store
00132   // all of the intensities
00133   if (m_Streams.empty()) {
00134     m_TransformedIMart->setStoreAllCelIntensities(false);
00135   }
00136   std::vector<float> data;
00137   for (int d = 0; d < dataSetCount; d++) {
00138     data = iMart->getCelData(d);
00139     newChip(data);
00140     m_ChipCount++;
00141     transform(d, data);
00142     m_TransformedIMart->setProbeIntensity(d, data);
00143   }
00144 
00145   chipStreamPassNewChip(m_TransformedIMart);
00146 }
00147 
00148 void GcBg::setControlProbes(std::vector<int> &vec) {
00149   md5sum md5;
00150   for(int i = 0; i < vec.size(); i++) {
00151     md5.update_nbo(vec[i]);
00152   }
00153   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00154   setOptValue("subsetmd5", m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00155   m_BgProbes = vec;
00156 }
00157 
00158 void GcBg::setControlProbes(std::vector<Probe *> &vec) {
00159   m_BgProbes.resize(vec.size());
00160 
00161   for(int i = 0; i < vec.size(); i++) {
00162     m_BgProbes[i] = vec[i]->id;
00163   }
00164 
00165   setControlProbes(m_BgProbes);
00166 }
00167 
00168 /** 
00169  * Setting the GC counts for all the probes on the array.
00170  * @param vec - GC count for every probe on array indexed by id.
00171  */
00172 void GcBg::setProbeGcVec(const std::vector<char> &vec) {
00173   if(m_BgProbes.empty()) {
00174     APT_ERR_ABORT("GcBG::setProbeGcVec() - Must specify background probe ids first.");
00175   }
00176   m_BgProbeGc.resize(vec.size());
00177   for(int i = 0; i < m_BgProbeGc.size(); i++) {
00178     m_BgProbeGc[i] = (char) vec[i];
00179   }
00180 }
00181 
00182 /** 
00183  * Setting the GC counts for all the probes on the array.
00184  * @param vec - GC count for every probe on array indexed by id.
00185  */
00186 void GcBg::setProbeGcVec(const std::vector<unsigned char> &vec) {
00187   if(m_BgProbes.empty()) {
00188     APT_ERR_ABORT("GcBG::setProbeGcVec() - Must specify background probe ids first.");
00189   }
00190   m_BgProbeGc.resize(vec.size());
00191   for(int i = 0; i < m_BgProbeGc.size(); i++) {
00192     m_BgProbeGc[i] = (char) vec[i];
00193   }
00194 }
00195 
00196 /**
00197  * Setup the background probes and background gc indexes by reading
00198  * them from the blackboard
00199  */
00200 void GcBg::setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00201   std::vector<int> vec;
00202   board.getProbeInfo()->getGcControlProbes(vec);
00203   setControlProbes(vec);
00204   std::vector<char> gcVec;
00205   board.getProbeInfo()->getProbeGc(gcVec);
00206   setProbeGcVec(gcVec);
00207 }
